text:
Docs suggest issues with JDK 1.4;  1.4.1 works perfectly fine.

DW
creator: dirkx@apache.org
mariocormier@sympatico.ca
text:
The FAQ, item 2.8 for instance.  It doesn't say that there are issues though, 
only that JDK 1.4 hasn't been tested yet.

I run JDK 1.4.2. I'm seeing no issues. If there are specific issues please
reopen this bug
creator: kevin@rocketred.com.au

text:
The problem is not that it doesn't work with 1.4, the problem is that the 
*documentation* says it doesn't.

I found these (erroneous) references to Java 1.4:
- /src/documentation/content/xdocs/faq.xml, line 134
- /src/documentation/content/xdocs/guide-developer.xml, line 188
- /src/documentation/content/xdocs/dev/guide-developer.xml, line 198
creator: mcormier@miranda.com
